# Brazier of Aura Revealing (Law) (WondArch)
## Overview
**Brazier of Aura Revealing (law):** This works like a *[[Brazier of Aura Revealing (Evil) (WondArch)|brazier of aura revealing (evil)]]*, except that it detects law instead and you can only be overwhelmed if youâ€™re chaotic.

*Caster Level:* 3rd; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Detect Law (Spell)|detect law]]**; Market Price:* 3,000 gp.
